review: This has been great! I don't own a gaming system...not into video games and was watching Netflix on my laptop or tablet. No more! Now, I can see them on the big screen. It was a breeze to set up and navigation is intuitive.Just one, tiny complaint--not sure who designed the remote, but they missed the mark on the opening feature for inserting batteries. It is very difficult to open. Because it is smooth, there is no clear way to gain grip or determine where to apply force. There is no indication where to push or in which direction. I spent 15 minutes trying to open it, getting frustrated, feeling stupid and finally calling customer support. Fix this slight flaw and five stars would be yours.
